channel.title: Eclipse Video Lesson
channel.description:
I found this while scavenging the internet. It may help some of you who are trying to learn Eclipse. I will warn you, the voice of the man who does the commentary is extremely boring, but if you are persistent about learning the in's and out's of Eclipse. All power to you for listening to him.
http://jonah.cs.elon.edu/dpowell2/Courses/EclipseTutorial/Eclipse%20Tutorial%20in%20Video/Eclipse%20Tutorial%20in%20Video.html

item.title: Eclipse Video Lesson
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“DivineSouls, post:11, topic:375678”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=471606.msg3451068#msg3451068 date=1293751554]

That’s why we have a choice about this, we can either watch it. Or not.

Or we. Can. Just ignore. It.
[/quote]

lol, I have no comment on how stupid you made yourself sound. You just rephrased what I said.[/quote]

Gfbank.

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse Video Lesson
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I worded myself wrong. First of all, to clarify. I DID NOT make this video, never said I did. My voice is much more entertaining then his lol. How many dumb questions have you received about programming a server? I’m sure that when people out there try Eclipse, they might have plenty of dumb questions. So like David said, I’m not sure there is a much to learn about Eclipse. True, but I’m just posting this thread for the hell of it, maybe one lonely guy will come along and thank me on the way, I don’t know. By experience, I meant someone who actually knows what they are doing with computers in general.

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse Video Lesson
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“DivineSouls, post:5, topic:375678”]I like how the most experienced people at coding are looking at this thread. I found this, I’m targeting the noobies at coding and the ones that are first taking a look atdays Eclispe. I don’t know if they understand it or not, if not, this is the answer to all there little problems.[/quote]Please visit MITB before saying anyone here is experienced at coding.

I didn’t watch the video, but what Alec said looks right: it’s not even about programming.
I guess ‘noobies’ might be able to use it, but Eclipse really isn’t that hard.

Read full topic
